suggest.meta_keywords: GraphQL API, Top X Queries, query analysis, data visualization, HTTP dataset, data aggregation, Postman GraphQL, tsRange, requestUri sorting, count operator
suggest.meta_description: Learn to perform advanced data visualization and analysis using Top X Queries through the GraphQL API, focusing on HTTP dataset aggregation with detailed examples.

current.meta_description: Top X queries are mainly used for performing queries and analysis on data. They help visualize how resources and tools are being used and provide a more detailed analysis of certain conditions that are either more or less commonly used.
